td.b: NOTIFICATION OF A NON-CITIZEN EMPLOYEE’S CESSATION OF

tr.td: This form is to be completed by the employer. It will take about 10 minutes to complete. Please get ready the employee’s personal particulars and employment income details for the year of cessation and the prior year. Do read the explanatory notes when completing this form.

td.b: TYPE OF FORM IR21 (Please cross “x” where appropriate)

tr.td:
Additional, this is in addition to
Form IR21 dated

Amended, this supersedes Form IR21
dated

tr.td: I, the undersigned, hereby give notice under Section 68 of the Income Tax Act, that the employee named in this form will cease to be employed and/or will probably leave Singapore on the date(s) stated. I also certify that the information given in this form and in any documents attached is true, correct and complete.
